definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]

sentences.english: One reason that the fartlek workout is so popular is that it is so flexible.
sentences.chinese: 之所以流行的理由之一即是法特莱克训练非常灵活。

sentences.english: Metal's ability to conduct electricity is due to the loosely held electrons found in metals.
sentences.chinese: 金属之所以导电是因为金属里有自由移动的电子。

sentences.english: Non-verbal, because it does not involve the use of words.
sentences.chinese: 之所以称之为非言语交际，是因为它不涉及言词。

sentences.english: I make my pain a ear a urd, afraid that you should do so.
sentences.chinese: 我之所以把我的痛苦说得可笑，因为我怕你会这样做。

sentences.english: But business is good because it attracts hot-blooded males.
sentences.chinese: 生意之所以好是因为这吸引来了热血男士。

sentences.english: Nature satisfies by its loveliness, and without any mixture of corporeal benefit…
sentences.chinese: 自然之所以悦人是因其可爱，不掺杂任何物欲之念。

sentences.english: Here lies the unreality of fiction.
sentences.chinese: 小说之所以不真实正在这里。

sentences.english: Tokugawa flow of small and large Mamoud of this world are the reason for the large.
sentences.chinese: 小德川流，大德敦化，此天地之所以为大也。

sentences.english: Professor Bruix: It has been difficult because before there was nothing that was effective. Everything was non-effective everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 之所以有困难是因为之前没有任何有效的治疗。

sentences.english: What makes viruses dangerous is the ability to perform an event.
sentences.chinese: 计算机病毒之所以危险，是因为它们可以制造事端。

sentences.english: I'm asking because I think so highly of you.
sentences.chinese: 我之所以请求您，是因为我真的很尊重您。

sentences.english: The reason they didn't take them was because the Suns chose not to foul them.
sentences.chinese: 他们之所以投不进是因为太阳队没有选择对他们犯规。

sentences.english: It is transparent because users do not need to know how it is implemented.
sentences.chinese: 之所以说透明，是因为用户不必了解它是如何实现的。

sentences.english: Because his parents had paved a good way for him, he didn't worry about it at all.
sentences.chinese: 他之所以一点不急，是因为父母已为他铺好了道路。

sentences.english: Thus several intelligent animals owed their status to him;
sentences.chinese: 之所以一些动物非常聪明完全是拜特伦特所赐。

sentences.english: I was able to write this poem because I go to cemetery so often.
sentences.chinese: 我之所以能够写出这首诗是由于我常去尸林。
